snippet: Days after Spain agreed to a bailout, the bloc’s central bank proposed creating an alliance to share the financial burden of troubled banks.
abstract: European Central Bank calls for euro zone leaders to form a 'banking union' alliance to oversee its large financial institutions in a move that would help shield countries and their citizens from the misfortunes of troubled lenders.
lead_paragraph: Days after Spain agreed to a bailout, the bloc’s central bank proposed creating an alliance to share the financial burden of troubled banks.
